data.blankContent: Artificial life is the simulation of any aspect of life, as through computers, robotics, or biochemistry. The ____ of ____ life ____ traditional ____ by ____ some ____ of ____ phenomena. Scientists ____ the ____ of ____ systems ____ creating ____ environments - seeking ____ understand ____ complex ____ processing ____ defines ____ systems. While life is, by definition, alive, artificial life is generally referred to as data confined to a digital environment and existence.

The st___ of artif_____ life imit____ traditional bio____ by recre_____ some asp____ of biolo_____ phenomena. While life is, by definition, alive, artificial life is generally referred to as data confined to a digital environment and existence.
data.answer: 人工生命是对生命各个方面的模拟，如通过计算机、机器人或生物化学。人工生命研究通过再现生物现象的某些方面来模仿传统生物学。科学家通过创造人工环境来研究生命系统的逻辑——试图理解定义这种系统的复杂信息处理过程。虽然生命从定义上讲是有生命的，但人工生命通常被称为局限于数字环境和存在的数据。
